text: This is hilarious! I guess the cat's out of the bag now – they're just trolling us with all those meows.
Can you imagine if the cat actually said something profound, like revealing the secrets of the universe? That would've been a game changer.
Or the cat could just explain why they always knock things off tables. I'd be satisfied with that.
This makes me wonder if other animals would have similarly limited vocabularies, or if some might have a more extensive range of expressions.
Honestly, I'm impressed that the cat can even say "meow" intelligently. It's like teaching a parrot to say "squawk."
I'd say this is just a stepping stone for AI. Soon, we'll have cats writing code and taking over our jobs.
Good luck to them trying to solve those LeetCode problems. It's a cat-astrophe waiting to happen.
I, for one, welcome our new feline overlords. Who's with me?
As long as they don't introduce any cat-based programming languages, I'm on board.
Oh, c'mon! A cat-based programming language sounds pawsome!
